media:group.media:title: Christmas special, making it snow.
media:group.media:description:
For this (belated) Christmas special I take a look at a few different ways we can add snow to a scene and make it interactive.

References:
Using viewports for dynamic snow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F_KZyc_kLYs
Sobel filter for normals: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5281261/generating-a-normal-map-from-a-height-map
Blending normals: https://blog.selfshadow.com/publications/blending-in-detail/
